title: Replace JJK characters with Streets of Tyson roster and add login screen

requirements.text: Replace all existing Jujutsu Kaisen characters in the backend with a complete roster of Streets of Tyson characters from books 1 through 25, maintaining the existing Character type structure (id, name, attack, defense, speed, cursedEnergy, element, abilities, domainExpansion)

quotes: all Streets of Tyson characters from book 1 to 25

acceptanceCriteria: Backend contains Streets of Tyson characters spanning books 1-25
All characters follow the existing Character type schema
Character data includes appropriate stats, abilities, and domain expansions themed to Streets of Tyson universe

requirements.text: Update character selection screen to display the new Streets of Tyson character roster with their themed portraits and stats

quotes: customize characters with all Streets of Tyson characters

acceptanceCriteria: Character selection screen fetches and displays Streets of Tyson characters
Character cards show appropriate Streets of Tyson themed information
Both players can select from the full roster

requirements.text: Create a login screen accessible by pressing the Q key that serves as the entry point to the game, using the existing Internet Identity authentication system

quotes: when you press q you log in the game

acceptanceCriteria: Q key triggers display of login screen
Login screen integrates with existing Internet Identity authentication
After successful login, user proceeds to character selection
Login screen displays 'JJK Arena' as the game title

requirements.text: Update all UI text, branding, and references to reflect 'JJK Arena' as the official game name while keeping the Streets of Tyson character theme
acceptanceCriteria: Header and branding elements show 'JJK Arena'
Game maintains Streets of Tyson character roster while using JJK Arena branding

constraints: Preserve existing combat control scheme (W=jump, A=move back, S=crouch, D=move forward, G=punch, N=domain expansion, H=black flash, K=show moveset)
Maintain the existing Character type structure and battle system architecture
Keep the single-actor backend architecture in backend/main.mo
Do not modify immutable frontend paths: useInternetIdentity hooks, useActor.ts, main.tsx, components/ui
nonGoals: Changing the combat mechanics or battle system logic
Modifying the keyboard control mappings beyond adding Q for login
Replacing the existing domain expansion or black flash systems
Changing the React/Tailwind/React Query tech stack
